audio_sermons.title: Song Of Solomon - The Third Stage, Rest and Fruit
audio_sermons.description: Ed Miller shows the climactic experience of redemption, as the bride illustrates what it means to go from clinging to the Lord to leaning upon Him in rest and security.  "His love is so intense," he says, "you can't even mess it up with your sin."  Out of union with the Lord Jesus and gazing into His lovely face comes the beautiful fruit and rest that brings life to others in His Church.
